channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Charli XCX Says Bye to ‘Brat’ With Cryptic Message
item.description: Charli XCX shakes things up with a mysterious message! 🎶 What's she up to now? 🕵️‍♀️ #CharliXCX #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Get ‘Ice Cream Chillin’ With Ninja’s New Soft Serve Machine: Here’s Where to Find It Online
item.description: 🍦 Chill vibes alert! 🎵 Ninja drops hot soft serve machine! Get your 'Ice Cream Chillin' fix online now! #TreatYourself 🎶

item.title: Watch Rosé, FKA Twigs Down Shots Before ‘APT.’ at Blackpink’s London Show
item.description: 🥂 Cheers to Rosé and FKA Twigs living their best lives before hitting the stage in London! #SquadGoals 🎤 #BackstageAntics

item.title: Colossal Presents: 2025 America’s Next Top Hitmaker Champion, Mars Rodriguez
item.description: 🎉 Meet the future of music 🌟 Congrats to Mars Rodriguez, your 2025 America’s Next Top Hitmaker Champion! 🎶 #NextBigThing #MusicNews

item.title: Band To Watch: Racing Mount Pleasant
item.description: 🎸🌟 Pump up the volume for Racing Mount Pleasant! This band is bringing the fun with their infectious tunes! 🎶 #NewMusicDiscovery
